name: Global ID Framework Inc.
description: Developer of portable, private, and secure identity applications designed to commence a decentralized identification system. The company's application is biometrics-based with a private, secure, and encrypted surrogate, enabling individuals and groups to manage their portable identity.
one_liner: Developer of portable, private, and secure identity applications designed to commence a decentralized identification system. The company's application is biometrics-based with a private, secure, and encrypted surrogate, enabling individuals and groups to manage their portable identity.
